main event: A civilian observed a white, pencil-point shaped object traveling from west to east with a southerly drift in the sky over Arlington Heights, Illinois.
interesting points: The object was visible for about 8 minutes and followed a zig-zag flight path.
The observer did not see any tail, trail or exhaust from the object.
The object was described as star-like or satellite-like in appearance.
No optical aids were used to observe the object.
The weather conditions were clear with light winds at the time of the sighting.
